text:
Company: Morrison LLC

Role: Network Tier II Technician

Company Background:
Morrison LLC is a leading IT solutions provider, specializing in network infrastructure and cybersecurity. With a global reach, we aim to deliver top-notch service to our diverse clientele.

Job Description:
We are seeking a dedicated Network Tier II Technician to join our team. This role requires a high level of technical expertise and the ability to troubleshoot complex network issues. Our ideal candidate will be able to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment and contribute to our team’s success.

Responsibilities:
- Troubleshoot and resolve network issues.
- Maintain and upgrade network infrastructure.
- Collaborate with Tier I support and other departments.
- Document processes and perform regular network audits.
- Ensure network security measures are up-to-date.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
- Preference for native Vietnamese speakers.
- Seeking candidates who share our work ethic and fit our cultural profile.
- Must have a global perspective on business practices.
- 3-5 years of experience in a similar role.
- Relevant certifications (e.g., CCNA, CompTIA Network+).
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Employee wellness programs.

Experience Needed:
- Previous experience in network troubleshooting and infrastructure maintenance.
- Proven ability to work in a diverse and dynamic team.

Skills:
- Proficiency in network management tools.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Application Instructions:
To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are a fit for this role.
